name: lunar rifle
description: A standard issue LDC bolt-action rifle with an integrated bayonet. The design is based on an old human weapon, fabricated by and upgraded with Lunarian technology.  For that reason, it's mostly compatible with human tools and modifications.  It's powered by the spiritual energy of the user.
//: The SSiB training rifle is either based on a Mosin or the Japanese Type 89 that used 'type 38 chamber in 7.62×38mmR tracer' according to some post on Reddit. However, Type 89 doesn't seem to exist, only the Type 38 (6.5×50mm Arisaka) or 99 (7.7×58mm Arisaka), which is the one I'll use as basis

name: lunatic pistol
description: A standard issue LDC pistol with bunny ears on top of the muzzle and burst-fire capability. This is the second or third iteration of a design based on an old human weapon.  For that reason, it's mostly incompatible with human tools and modifications.  It's powered by the spiritual energy of the user.
